title: Lynda - Agile at Work: Getting Better with Agile Retrospectives
description:
Lynda - Agile at Work: Getting Better with Agile Retrospectives

FYI : This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been posed, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

1h 11m Intermediate Feb 04, 2016 | Uploaded in Apr 12, 2016 by 2boweb

Subject:  Business 
Author:  Doug Rose
 
An agile retrospective allows a team to continuously improve and get better together. This simple practice lets members step back from the day-to-day challenges with product delivery. Instead they focus on the team. "What are we doing well? What can we do better?" The answers to these questions help the team create a more agile mindset. They will be self-organized and more productive. Instead of a postmortem at the end of the project, they will have health checks throughout the project. In this course, agile expert Doug Rose outlines the five phases of a helpful retrospective: setting the right direction, getting all of the issues on the table, gathering insights from the team, making decisions, and finally, applying the changes. He uses starfish and PANCAKE diagrams to identify challenges and opportunities for process improvement, and shows how to close a retrospective with clear action items.â€¨â€¨Watch and learn agile project management techniques to assess your project today, and get back on track for tomorrow. Find more courses on agile project management in the Agile at Work series on Doug's author page.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Five phases of retrospectives
	â€¢	Choosing an ideal meeting space
	â€¢	Identifying issues and improvements
	â€¢	Working with a distributed team
	â€¢	Encouraging discussions
	â€¢	Setting goals using SMART criteria
	â€¢	Asking good questions
	â€¢	Making team decisions
	â€¢	Closing out an agile retrospective
